text: They imported from Egypt then exported a chariot for six hundred pieces of silver and a horse for one hundred fifty.1:17 The pieces of silver were probably shekels, so 600 pieces would be about 13.2 pounds or 6 kilograms of silver, and 150 would be about 3.3 pounds or 1.5 kilograms of silver. They also exported them to the Hittite kings and the Syrian1:17 or, Aramean kings.
